channel.title: Comments on: Cheers to Tech on Tap v1.3 PowerShell!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Ken Stuber
item.dc:creator: Ken Stuber
item.description: FYI, all of www.techontap.org except the homepage is blocked (out-of-the-box) by default by WebSense web filtering as a 'malicious site'. Not sure if there's anything you can do about it, but thought you'd want to know that many of us cannot visit the site at work...<br />
item.content:encoded: FYI, all of http://www.techontap.org/ except the homepage is blocked (out-of-the-box) by default by WebSense web filtering as a ‘malicious site’. Not sure if there’s anything you can do about it, but thought you’d want to know that many of us cannot visit the site at work…
